name: Dedicated Point Defense Gunners
desc:
While not as effective as IPDAI, it still allows all point-defense weapons the ability to identify - and ignore - decoy flares. Also increases all damage to missiles by %s.

However, it doesn't give them the best target leading and increases minimum crew required by %s.
short: PD ignores decoy flares, more damage to missiles, increase crew requirement.
sModDesc:
All small non-missile, non-strike weapons are classified as "point-defense", automatically target missiles, and are affected by point-defense stat modifiers. 

Improved gunner seats gives them the improved target leading and only increases minimum crew required by %s.

name: Insulated Hull
desc: Decreases the amount of EMP damage taken from weapons such as Ion Cannons by %s and increases the ship's hull integrity by %s.
short: Increases hull integrity; decrease EMP damage taken.
sModDesc: Further decreases the amount of EMP damage taken from weapons such as Ion Cannons by %s and further increases the ship's hull integrity by %s.

name: Naval Hull
desc: Hullmod swithc logic disabled cause I can't figure it out, this now acts as a simple gate check to allow for armor layouts to be applied.
